= Manual =

[http://chainsaw-synth.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/chainsaw_screenshot.png]

Controls

  # [Stereo Spread] - Sets the oscillator stereo spread amount
  # [Detune] - Sets the amount of detuning between oscillators.
  # [NumberOfOsc Number of OSC] - Number of [Oscillator oscillators]
  # [Filter Filter Cutoff] - LPF cutoff frequency
  # [Filter Filter Resonance] - LPF Resonance
  # [FilterADSR Filter ADSR Effect] - How much the ADSR effects filter.
